name: Into Sunset
description:
Imagine sitting in the passenger seat on a late-night drive.

Actions:
- Tell the driver to go faster by holding down [Space Bar].
- Tell the driver to pick up gas by clicking on the Gas Canisters
on the road.

Hazards:
- Avoid ramming the other vehicles.
- Don't run out of gas.

Goal:
- How far can you get?
